item.title: Tom Hiddleston Breaks His Silence On Returning To The MCU As Loki In Avengers: Doomsday
item.description: As Loki is set to return to the Marvel Cinematic Universe in Avengers: Doomsday, Tom Hiddleston is finally opening up about his next appearance.

item.title: My Wildest Avengers: Doomsday Theory Suggests One Of The Best X-Men Movies Will Be Required Viewing
item.description: One of my biggest and craziest Avengers: Doomsday movies involves one of the best X-Men movies and even more mutants than we already know about.

item.title: Edward Norton's A Complete Unknown Role Almost Didn't Happen
item.description: Edward Norton's performance as Peter Seeger was one of the best things about James Mangold's A Complete Unknown, but it almost didn't happen.
